tag.description: A Responsive/Adaptive Layout component. Can be rendered on both Mobile and Desktop.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: Inline style of the Layout.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Style class of the Layout.
attribute.name: styleClass

tag.description: A Responsive/Adaptive Layout Pane component. Can be rendered on both Mobile and Desktop.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: Inline style of the container.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Style class of the container.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Label of the Pane, Visible in the Menue and Header in the Mobile Mode.
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Position of the Pane. Possible Values are [north, west, center, east, south]
attribute.name: position

attribute.description: Width of the Pane. Default 20% for East/West and 60% for Center, 100% for North/South]
attribute.name: width

attribute.description: Height of the Pane. Default 60% for East/West and 60% for Center, 20% for North/South]
attribute.name: height

tag.description: A Responsive/Adaptive Grid component. Can be rendered on both Mobile and Desktop.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Inline style of the Grid Column.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Style class of the Grid Column.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Number of Columns for Grid
attribute.name: columns

attribute.description: Tempalte for Grid Columns
attribute.name: template

tag.description: A Responsive/Adaptive Group component. Can be rendered on both Mobile and Desktop.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Inline style of the Group.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Style class of the Group.
attribute.name: styleClass

tag.description: A Responsive/Adaptive Output Component. Can be rendered on both Mobile and Desktop.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Output Type CARD, HORIZONTAL, VERTICAL. Default being CARD
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: Lable/Header for the Output.
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Lable/Header Icon for the Output.
attribute.name: labelIcon

attribute.description: Value for the Output.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: Value Icon for Output.
attribute.name: valueIcon

attribute.description: Escape for the Output. Default being false
attribute.name: escape

attribute.description: Inline style of the Group.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Style class of the Group.
attribute.name: styleClass
